description: Details required for Condition 53 (Water re-use/harvesting) of planning permission 20/02495/FUL (Full planning application for the demolition of Surrey House, Multi Storey Car Park, Hippodrome and Bo Concept and the erection of 2 (two) Office buildings [Use Class - E(g)(i)] Building A and Building B: Building A 9 storeys (22,144 (GEA) sqms) Building B 11 storeys (11,587 (GEA) sqms). The erection of a replacement multi storey car park of 354 spaces plus cycle parking (for use as a public car park at weekends) landscaping, public realm upgrades, servicing, pedestrian and vehicular access.  This application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement. This application is Phase 1 of a 2 stage development - Phase 2 is covered by application reference 20/02499/OUT.Additional Reconsultation Information: All footpaths around the island site repaved, Eden Street, Brook Street and St James Road repaving and landscaping works, provision of limited access to private car park roof top gardens; Contributions to Kingston Workmatch Job Brokerage service, the delivery of flexible, affordable workspace and the implementation of an Employment and Skills Plan. Other matters contained within the planning application have not changed)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: PROPST P4 St James Area. Policies
KEYACH Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change
